item.description:
Enough with the tex-mex chain restaurants and taco kits from your local supermarket! Monte Alban offers authentic Mexican cuisine--a new taste for an EDEMG event. The owner/chef, Alfonso Martinez, came to Hartford from Mexico in 1987. He wanted to create a small, mom-and-pop style restaurant as close to his heritage as possible. Even the decorations on the wall are typical of Monte Alban, a remote city in southeastern Mexico.

I have heard great things about this restaurant! I should also mention that Martinez makes everything with fresh ingredients from scratch, so no preservatives or frozen, processed products.

A review in the Hartford Courant: http://www.ctnow.com/...

CAUTION: Do NOT park in Kinko's parking lot across the street! (even if you need to make copies before dinner). You WILL be towed!

group.name: The Ethnic Dining Enthusiasts Meetup Group

item.name: A Taste of Mexico--Monte Alban in Hartford
